question:
Which of the following kings were the feudatories of Mahipala II?
1) Visvaditya
2) Isvaraghosa
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: During the reign of Mahipala II, the feudatories became more powerful. One of them was Visvaditya who was the ruler of Gaya Mandala. The other feudatory was Isvaraghosa who was the chief of Dhekkari.
